_header: Long have I made of ladies white
_description: William Dunbar, ‘On ane blakmoir’ — five 5-line stanzas with refrain, ‘My ladye with the mekle lippis’

CULLl510.First Lines:
Lang haue I maid of Ladyis quhyttNow of ane blak I will
                    indytt…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…And neuer to vther confort clameMy Lady with þe mekele
                    Lippis
CULLl510.Attributed Author: Quod dumbar of ane blak moir (f. 46)

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Lang heff I maed of ladyes quhyttnou of an blak I will
                    indytt…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…and newir to wther confort claemmy ladye with þe mekle
                    lippis
CamMagPep2553.Attributed Author: quod dunbar of an blak moir (p. 342)
